content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at 4:15 am on may 21st 2012 to go get a glass of water, when i finished drinking my water i took a peek outside from the kitchen window. at first i tought somebody was in the field behind my house (wooded area)with a flashlight (about 100 feet at first) but i noticed that the light was blinking, i was a bit worried about the possibility of a burglar. i kept watching, after about 10 seconds the light was coming in my direction in a straight line. as it got closer i realized that it was about 15 feet from the ground, it got out of the woods and stopped in my backyard about 25 to 30 feet from the house, it hovered for about 5 seconds, it started to go to the left, it stopped hovered 2 to 3 seconds, after went to the right, up and down, it stopped again at about 5 feet from the ground and hovered again for about 5 seconds, i decided to go outside, i slowly opened the patio door and went on the deck so i could have a good look at it. i stood in front of it for about 10 seconds, it raised about 15 to 20 feet from the ground and left slowly and lost sight of it behind my neighbours houses. i really don't know wat it was, i'm not saying that it is a ufo, i am skeptic about these things, is it an explainable phenomenon ? maybe it is. that is why i am reporting it. maybe somebody could give me an answer. the description of the object (if it is an object) was about the size of a golfball, it emitted an extremely bright white light, it was blinking aproximately every 2 seconds and it was completely silent. i was totally shocked and could not go back to sleep after the sighting, i am still troubled as i am writing down this report.

thank you ...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at 4:15 am on may 21st 2012 to go get a glass of water, when i finished drinking my water i took a peek outside from the kitchen window. at first i tought somebody was in the field behind my house (wooded area)with a flashlight (about 100 feet at first) but i noticed that the light was blinking, i was a bit worried about the possibility of a burglar. i kept watching, after about 10 seconds the light was coming in my direction in a straight line. as it got closer i realized that it was about 15 feet from the ground, it got out of the woods and stopped in my backyard about 25 to 30 feet from the house, it hovered for about 5 seconds, it started to go to the left, it stopped hovered 2 to 3 seconds, after went to the right, up and down, it stopped again at about 5 feet from the ground and hovered again for about 5 seconds, i decided to go outside, i slowly opened the patio door and went on the deck so i could have a good look at it. i stood in front of it for about 10 seconds, it raised about 15 to 20 feet from the ground and left slowly and lost sight of it behind my neighbours houses. i really don't know wat it was, i'm not saying that it is a ufo, i am skeptic about these things, is it an explainable phenomenon ? maybe it is. that is why i am reporting it. maybe somebody could give me an answer. the description of the object (if it is an object) was about the size of a golfball, it emitted an extremely bright white light, it was blinking aproximately every 2 seconds and it was completely silent. i was totally shocked and could not go back to sleep after the sighting, i am still troubled as i am writing down this report.

thank you ...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change

content.detailedDescription: Four whelling a friend seen a shape  looked like a sphere nade no noise and contact for moer information 8289259300 ask for mike
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sphere ball set under sun refleted a ultrasound picture and very rapid movement plus more.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in a field next to an apartment parking lot, smoking a cigarette.  i was looking s-se at the stars and some planes.  i noticed 2 lights that appeared the same size as the planes flying over, but they were twinkling and did not have the flashing red light visible.  they caught my eye because i had scanned past them and when i looked back, they were closer together than previously.  so i started watching them.

at first sighting they appeared a thumblength apart.  it seemed like they were both moving from se to nw, when suddenly one seemed to 'dart' ne bringing it to '1/2 thumb length' from the other. they then continued moving nw steadily for approximately 1 minute, the change in position in that time was approximately 1".  they then stopped completely for several seconds & then one of them seemed to move in a small circle. this movement continued for approximately 1 minute.  

at that time, another object caught my eye.  it was also headed from se to nw, but appeared bigger and brighter than the other two. it was headed on a path directly towards me.  i focused my attention on it for a split second, then, thinking it might be a plane, looked back at the other two objects and they were gone.  i scanned that section of the sky for about a minute trying to figure out where they had gone - no cloud cover, no trees - nothing blocking my view....Then noticed this bigger object again.

it appeared lower than the other two because i could make out more of a shape to it. it appeared, at first, vaguely v shaped, but again there was no flashing red light commonly seen on planes here.  it also had a bright-white-blueish glow to it with an occasional blue and yellow light pulsing.  i still wasnt convinced it wasnt a plane, but continued to watch.  over the course of 10 minutes or so, it moved from about 65 degrees above the horizon to 90 degrees above the horizon and directly overhead.

during that time, it did a lot of zig-zagging, seemed to slow down then speed up, changed direction a few times, and appeared stationary a few times.  as it got almost directly overhead, it suddenly diminished in size which made me think it had rapidly gained altitude.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 objects appeared high in the sky - estimating 20-30,000 feet since various aircraft were also seen at approximately same altitude

content.detailedDescription: Witness reports that during his childhood, he and his brother encountered an unidentifiable object hovering in their backyard.  it is believed by both the witness and his brother that the brother was abducted into the unknown craft while the witness ran for a camera. both believe they are missing time.  the witness was also in the presence of an unknown entity while in the garage. [5-22-12/mcm]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path
content.summary: Witness and brother missing time during close encounter.  historical./mcm

content.detailedDescription:
On may 21, 2012, while driving in clifton, nj, i was distracted by an
image on an oil truck driving ahead of me.  i was able to get a quick
picture of it as i was driving.  after observing the picture later in
the day i noticed something in the top corner of the shot.  it looked
like an oval shape that didn���t seem to be any type of familiar object.
 after zooming in to get a better look, it occurred that the object
looked similar to a ufo.
after viewing the picture a few times i was unable to come to any
other conclusion.  i believe i captured the image of a ufo passing
over rt 3 in clifton, nj.  i returned to the site several hours later
to see if the object was still there but it was gone.
content.flightPath: Unknown
content.summary: Grey/silver oval shaped flying object flying a little over tree level

content.detailedDescription: Cylinder shape object hovering over bellevue park area. started around there and headed toward silver lake reservoir. 5pm. it was taking a smooth path and looked as if it was transforming or something, giving off the suns light . could have been a balloon, but this was bigger.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path
content.summary: Cylinder shape object hovering over bellevue park area

content.detailedDescription: I observed three red/orange lights in geometrically perfect formation (triangular, vertex down) from a 16th floor balcony.  i viewed them between two high rise buildings which were about a 1/4 mile north of my position.   my  observation lasted only a few seconds before the lights winked out in unison.  there was an aircraft above and behind the lights which gave me an idea of their range which appeared to be about 5 miles.  there was no sound and it was below my viewing angle on the 16th floor.  i noticed it because it was moving slowly and had a definite geometry.  i thought perhaps it was fireworks but it moved too slowly and had a geometry and behavior that suggested precise control as opposed to chance.  it moved quite slowly from west to east and blinked out abruptly, i describe it as a unit because they moved in such perfect unison.  it happened so fast that i said to my friends on the balcony; "hey look....Never mind."
content.flightPath: Straight-line path
content.summary: I observed three red/orange lights in geometrically perfect formation (triangular vertex down) from a 16th floor balcony.  i viewed them between two high rise buildings which were about a 1/4 mile north.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i often sit outdoors in the evening and last night shortly after i joined him outside he pointed out an object that he had noticed in the sky.  he pointed out an object in the western sky about 45 degrees from the horizon that had moved into a position just over the treeline.  i told him that i thought that it was venus but he told me that it wasn't because he saw the object move into the location that it was now visible.

i continued to keep an eye on the object and noticed that it slowly dimmed and could no longer be seen with the naked eye.  it stayed dim/off for awhile and then shortly after became bright again.  the object was not as bright as venus but bigger and brighter than any other star in the sky.  a couple of airplanes flew overhead and we noticed the object dim again. we were able to see the object through binoculars and couldn't find a defined shape to it but noted that it did not have any strobes nor did it make noise. i took out my htc android cellphone and turned on the video recording option.  i was able to capture the object on camera as it hovered and dimmed on and off for about 16 minutes.  note that i was able to establish a landmark on video as the neighbors solar path lights were on and can be seen on the bottom left of the footage.  the porch light was not on at their home nor is there a street light behind the house.

the total time that we observed the object was 16-18 minutes.

i have 2 recording of the object and have uploaded them to youtube.  the first is 25 sec and the second is a little over 16 mins long.

note that due to the quality of cellphone recording and the distance of the object that it had to be extremely bright to even show up on the recording at all.  you do not see the object distinctly but with my candid narrations you are able to make out what i was able to catch in the footage.  i incorrectly stated the date on the footage.  the object was indeed observed on monday, may 21, 2012 between 9:25 and 9:45 p.M. cst.
content.flightPath: Path then hovering
content.summary: Object observed hovering over austin on may 21, 2012

content.detailedDescription: Frank came in my room tuesday night, may 21,2012 to tell me he saw some red glowing objects in the sky. the one out front was high near the stars and glowing a bright red glow and changing directions up and down and at times the red glow became dimmer, then bright again. we also saw two red glowing objects above the hill behind our home. one was sitting on top of the hill, then out of sight, then back above the hill again, then back on top of the hill, then out of sight. the other one stayed higher above the power lines. don't know how long they stayed around, i went back to bed after watching them for about 20 minutes.Not sure what they were, just red glowing objects moving around in the sky.Event happened may 21, 2012 at 10:30 pm when we first noticed it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path
content.summary: Observed round glowing objects in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was standing with my cousin and i looked in the sky and saw it was flying over top at night it didnt make a noise and it was really high in the sky and was solid i could not see stars in back of it  there is an airport but this ufo had no lights and was going the opposite direction.It was flying at slow speed then took off in high velocity
content.flightPath: Straight-line path
content.summary: It was flying over top at night it didnt make a noise and it was really high in the sky and was solid i could not see stars in back of it
